meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that lack a cell wall and are the smallest free-living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Mycoplasmas are tiny bacteria without a cell wall.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study mycoplasmas to understand their unique structure.
meanings.sent3: The mycoplasmas decided to have a party without building any walls.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, mycoplasmas are the rebels without walls.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, mycoplasmas look like little wall-less creatures.

meanings.definition: Any of various parasitic or pathogenic bacteria of the genus Mycoplasma, causing diseases in humans and other animals.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian treated the sick dog for mycoplasmas.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching ways to combat mycoplasmas infections.
meanings.sent3: The mycoplasmas threw a party in the host's body, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Mycoplasmas are like tiny troublemakers, sneaking into our bodies.
meanings.sent5: The impact of mycoplasmas on health can be significant and concerning.
